pageContext.claim: “The Woodward book has already been refuted and discredited by General (Secretary of Defense) James Mattis and General (Chief of Staff) John Kelly. Their quotes were made up frauds, a con on the public. Likewise other stories and quotes. Woodward is a Dem operative? Notice timing?”
pageContext.analysis: There's no reason to believe Woodward is a "Dem operative." He has written about every president since Nixon and while tough, is widely considered to be fair.
